hero.title: Your company's communication, finally in one place.
hero.subtitle: Centralis replaces the chaos of informal apps with a professional platform that integrates announcements, events and chats for your SME.

problem.title: Is your internal communication fragmented?
problem.description: Many SMEs struggle with disorganization. Vital information is lost in WhatsApp groups, personal life gets mixed with work, and corporate tools are too complex or expensive.
problem.pain2: Lack of a formal channel for announcements.

solution.title: Introducing Centralis: The all-in-one platform.
solution.description: Centralis is a mobile application designed by Synera startup to centralize and simplify internal communication. We offer an intuitive, powerful and organized alternative.
solution.benefit1Desc: Less time searching for information, more time working.
solution.benefit2Desc: A single channel for everyone to stay informed.
solution.benefit3Desc: Separates work from personal life and improves collaboration.

features.title: Main Features
features.subtitle: This section is a quick overview that links to the Product page.
features.feature1Desc: A formal space to publish vital announcements and ensure they reach everyone.
features.feature2Desc: Create and manage meetings, trainings and corporate events easily.
features.feature3Desc: Flexible work groups by department or project, 100% professional.

segments.title: Who is it for?
segments.managersDesc: A formal channel to disseminate information, organize activities and ensure your team receives communications.
segments.employeesDesc: A collaborative and official space to communicate, without mixing your personal life with professional and without losing important information.

ctaFinal.title: Simplify your communication today.
ctaFinal.description: Leave disorganization behind and turn internal communication into an advantage for your company.

product.heroSubtitle: Discover how Centralis unifies communication flow in a native mobile application for Android and iOS.
product.announcementsTitle: Vital information that always reaches its destination.
product.announcementsDesc: Publish news and formal announcements in a dedicated space. Ideal for communications that cannot be lost in a chat.
product.announcementsFeature3: Targeted to managers who need a secure channel.
product.eventsTitle: Organize meetings and trainings without chaos.
product.eventsDesc: Centralize the creation and management of all company events. Reduce time spent on logistical coordination.
product.eventsFeature3: Ideal for hybrid or remote teams.
product.chatsDesc: Allows the creation of flexible and personalized work groups, completely separating personal communication from professional.
product.chatsFeature1: Groups by departments, teams or projects.
product.chatsFeature2: A secure and exclusive environment for work.
product.chatsFeature3: The professional alternative to informal applications.
product.scopeDesc: Centralis is a native mobile application for Android and iOS. Our initial focus is on announcements, events and chats.
product.scopeNote: To maintain simplicity and efficiency, features like video calls, file storage or a web version are not included in the initial scope.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: The talented people behind Centralis
team.description: We are Synera, a startup dedicated to building solutions that improve internal communication for SMEs.

helpCenter.title: Help Center
helpCenter.faq1Desc: Centralis is a professional communication platform designed specifically for small and medium enterprises. It centralizes announcements, events, and team chats in one secure mobile application.
helpCenter.faq2Desc: Centralis is available as a native mobile application for both Android and iOS devices.
helpCenter.faq3Title: How can I request a demo?
helpCenter.faq3Desc: Please contact our team through the "Request a Demo" button on the homepage. We'll be happy to show you how Centralis can transform your company's communication.
helpCenter.faq4Desc: Yes! We take data security very seriously. All communications are encrypted and stored securely. Your company's information is completely private and protected.
helpCenter.faq5Desc: Centralis includes formal announcements and news distribution, event and meeting management, and professional group chats organized by departments or projects.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Intro: We collect information that you provide directly to us when using Centralis, including:
privacy.section2Intro: We use the information we collect to:
privacy.section2Item1: Provide and maintain the Centralis service
privacy.section2Item3: Communicate with you about updates and support
privacy.section3Desc: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. All data is encrypted both in transit and at rest.
privacy.section4Desc: We do not sell your personal information. We only share data with third parties when necessary to provide our services or when required by law.
privacy.section5Item4: Object to processing of your data
privacy.section6Desc: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us through our support channels.
privacy.disclaimer: By using Centralis, you agree to this Privacy Policy. We may update this policy from time to time, and we will notify you of any significant changes.
